tasks.label: unload driver
tasks.command: if [ -e /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tas5805m ] && [ -e /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tas5805m/1-002e ]; then echo "1-002e" | sudo tee /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tas5805m/unbind && sudo rmmod tas5805m && sudo rmmod snd_soc_simple_card; else echo "Nothing to do"; fi

tasks.label: load driver
tasks.command: sudo insmod tas5805m.ko && sudo modprobe snd_soc_simple_card
